StationStatus.StatusDetails: The Jubilee line is not serving this station while station upgrade work takes place.
The Bakerloo and Northern lines are not serving this station while upgrade work takes place. Please use nearby Charing Cross for the Bakerloo and Northern lines.
The Bakerloo and Northern lines are not serving this station while upgrade work takes place. Please use nearby Charing Cross for the Bakerloo and Northern lines.
The Piccadilly line is not serving this station while upgrade work takes place.
Eastbound trains only are not serving this station while upgrade work takes place.
Step free exit is not available to street level while we fix a faulty lift. Call our Travel Information Centre on 0343 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.
Step free access is not available from the car park to the ticket hall due to upgrade work. Call our Travel Information Centre on 0343 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.
No step free access to the District, Hammersmith & City and Jubilee lines due to planned maintenance work. Call our Travel Information Centre on 0343 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.

Step free access is not available for trains towards Stratford, Clapham Junction and Richmond, due to planned maintenance. Call our Travel Information Centre on 0843 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.
Step free access is not available to the westbound platform while we fix a faulty lift. Call our Travel Information Centre on 0343 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.

Step free access is not available between the ticket hall and the southbound platform while we fix a faulty lift. Call our Travel Information Centre on 0343 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.
Step free access is not available while we fix a faulty lift. Call our Travel Information Centre on 0343 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.
Step free access is not available for trains towards Canning Town due to upgrade work. Call our Travel Information Centre on 0343 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.
